definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: If there is next life, darling, I may be only for the humble round of the beast.
sentences.chinese: 假如有来生，亲爱的，我也许只能轮为卑微的畜生。

sentences.english: The other shore spends the first flower that is a future life, it is the only landscape on Acheron road.
sentences.chinese: 彼岸花是来生的第一朵花，是黄泉路上的唯一风景。

sentences.english: It is the door to eternity.
sentences.chinese: 同样地，此生是为来生作准备。

sentences.english: Afterlife, it will not be back of both hands?
sentences.chinese: 来生，是否不会将背影相送？

sentences.english: Is only in heart's feeling generally myriad, will treat as the previous generation to owe next life.
sentences.chinese: 只是心中的感概万千，当作前世来生相欠。

sentences.english: Perhaps she was having a foretaste of her unhappy future because of unwholesome kamma.
sentences.chinese: 可能她正在预尝一点由恶业决定的不幸的来生的苦味。

sentences.english: Xiaohui, a strong and lovely girl, must now become an angel living happily and healthily in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 祝福小慧在天堂也快快乐乐，来生做个健康快乐的人。

sentences.english: If there were the other life, let us not to drink the Lethe Water, will you?
sentences.chinese: 如果有来生，我们都不要喝孟婆汤，好吗？

sentences.english: If there is next life, darling, I may be turned into a round flower.
sentences.chinese: 假如有来生，亲爱的，我也许轮化为一朵花。

sentences.english: If there is a next life, darling, I may be turned into a round flower.
sentences.chinese: 若有来生，亲爱的，我也许轮化为一朵花。

sentences.english: I don’t believe in an afterlife, but I’m still bringing a change of underwear anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信有来生，但我还是准备带上换洗的内裤。

sentences.english: But, at the same time, the chief reward of the righteous lies in the hereafter.
sentences.chinese: 但同时，义人更重要的福份，是来生的奖赏。

sentences.english: One dead Yong kills person, still have coming to forcedly of world?
sentences.chinese: 人一死永灭，还是有来生生世？

sentences.english: If the next life we still can be turned into birds, wandering in the mountains of Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 是否来生我们依然可以化成青鸟，徘徊在蓬莱仙山。

definition: to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]
